sentences.en: A more charitable person would forgive the boy's errors.
sentences.cn: 宽容点儿的人就会原谅那男孩的过错.

sentences.en: But as with other charitable bodies, these figures mask the true picture.
sentences.cn: 但和其他慈善机构一样，这些数字掩盖了实情。

sentences.en: He had set up two charitable trusts.
sentences.cn: 他已设立了两个慈善信托机构。

sentences.en: He is a charitable judge of character.
sentences.cn: 他对于个性的判断很宽容.

sentences.en: More funds will now be allocated to charitable organizations.
sentences.cn: 现在会拨更多的资金给慈善组织.

sentences.en: She was a zealous worker for charitable bodies.
sentences.cn: 她对慈善事业充满热忱。

sentences.en: That is a charitable institution for the education of young children.
sentences.cn: 那是个从事儿童教育的慈善团体.

sentences.en: They are charitable. They feed the hungry and clothe the beggar.
sentences.cn: 他们是仁慈的, 他们给饥饿者饮食,给乞丐衣着.

sentences.en: They expand, put on weight, and give money to charitable organizations.
sentences.cn: 他们心胸宽广了, 人也发胖了, 他们还常给慈善机构捐款.

sentences.en: They were rather less than charitable towards the referee.
sentences.cn: 他们对裁判根本不体谅。

sentences.en: This list ranked companies that make charitable contributions of a half million dollars or more.
sentences.cn: 这张名单列出了慈善捐款额达50万美元以上的公司。

sentences.en: We are happy to donate to bona fide charitable causes.
sentences.cn: 我们很乐意为真正的慈善事业捐献财物。

sentences.en: Well, If I were rich I'd like to be charitable.
sentences.cn: 可我要是有了钱的话,我就要多做好事.

sentences.en: William Penn wrote in the cool, charitable vein of the Quaker faith.
sentences.cn: 威廉·佩恩以较左派冷静宽仁的特性写作.
